# Android
### [Call blocker app for Android (source code)](https://github.com/trombipeti/simplecallblocker/tree/master/SimpleCallBlocker/app/src/main/java/com/trombipeti/simplecallblocker)  
This was a university homework. It is optimized for Android KitKat, but works well on other versions too.  
[Documentation of the source code](https://github.com/trombipeti/simplecallblocker/blob/master/SimpleCallBlocker_doc.pdf)  
![Main screen](images/simplecallblocker-1.png)
